alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 29 at 6:26AM AKDT until October 29 at 1:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing Rain. A trace of ice accumulation possible. * WHERE...Anchorage and Eagle River. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Roads may be slippery. Travel may be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures hovering near freezing and areas of drizzle will create slick surfaces on roadways, sidewalks, and elevated surfaces this morning. Drizzle is expected to taper off over the next few hours and temperatures will gradually warm later this morning. Use caution and be prepared for developing slick spots if traveling this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
